enchantment.epicadditions.soul_tied.desc: Ties items to your soul, preventing them from being taken by death.
hovertext.item.pocket_cell_generator: Debug Item for testing pocket cell generation. Dev Purposes, cells will not be assigned to any player.
hovertext.item.pocket_cell_assignment_re: Unlinks your own pocket cell from your uuid. Used for dev debug purposes. Will result in a new Pocket Cell being generated.
hovertext.item.cell_index.status: You have Pocket Cell #%d on this server.
hovertext.item.pocket_key: Used to travel to the Pocket Dimension
